gw.webservice

Class IGroupAPI

  • gw.webservice.IGroupAPI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    public class IGroupAPI
implements _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    IGroupAPI provides mechanisms for adding new Groups to and obtaining information for existing Groups from ClaimCenter

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

        IntrinsicType

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IGroupAPI()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String addGroup(Group groupData)
      Adds the given group data to the system. if the data object doesn't contain a PublicID, one will be assigned. The parent, grouptype, and securityzone of the group data cannot be null.
      String findPublicIdByName(String groupName)
      Finds the public id of a group by the name.
      Group getGroup(String groupID)
      Retrieves a group given the group identifier or returns null if no group could be found.

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getGroup

        Group getGroup(String groupID)
        Retrieves a group given the group identifier or returns null if no group could be found.
        Parameters:
        groupID -
        Returns:
        The GroupData representing the group

      • addGroup

        String addGroup(Group groupData)
        Adds the given group data to the system. if the data object doesn't contain a PublicID, one will be assigned. The parent, grouptype, and securityzone of the group data cannot be null.
        Parameters:
        groupData - The GroupData object
        Returns:
        The public identifier of the group data object.

      • findPublicIdByName

        String findPublicIdByName(String groupName)
        Finds the public id of a group by the name.
        Parameters:
        groupName - the name of the group to match
        Returns:
        the matching group's publicId, or null if no Group exists with the given name.
